concepts.definition: An item on a problem list that can be managed over time and can be expressed by a practitioner (e.g. physician, nurse), patient, or related person.
A point in time diagnosis (e.g. from a physician or nurse) in context of an encounter.

valueset.name: ConditionCategoryCodes
valueset.description: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.
